articles.description: Vinicius Junior's second half goal ensured Real Madrid won their 14th Champions League crown, inflicting a second European Cup final defeat on Liverpool in four years.
articles.content:
Former Manchester United right-back Gary Neville admitted he is 'jubilant' the morning after Liverpool's narrow Champions League final defeat to Real Madrid.
